LanguageData.KOM.SanguophageTweaks.MessageCannotUseIn: Cannot use {ABILITY_label} on anyone it would kill or seriously injure, as {PAWN_labelShort} is incapable of violence.
LanguageData.KOM.SanguophageTweaks.Settings.EnableHem: A hemogenic pawn will lose hemogen at a rate proportional to their total bleed rate and hemogen concentration. Requires restart to change. Default: true.
LanguageData.KOM.SanguophageTweaks.Settings.EnableSki: Skip having the victim's body size influence on the blood and hemogen the biter gains. Requires restart to take effect.
Not much of a difference without VRES or additional body size genes. Default: true.
LanguageData.KOM.SanguophageTweaks.Settings.UseThisMo: Use this mod's formula for animal body size effect on animal bloodfeeder blood loss instead of VRE:S's. Requires restart to take effect.
Only has an effect when VRE:S is loaded. Default: true.
